properties.areaDesc: Presque Isle Light to Sturgeon Pt MI Including Thunder Bay National Marine Sanctuary; Sturgeon Pt to Alabaster MI; 5NM East of Mackinac Bridge to Presque Isle Light MI including Bois Blanc Island
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 12 at 3:37AM EST until January 12 at 11:00AM EST by NWS Gaylord MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Highest gusts up to 30 kt and highest waves 7 to 9 feet,
then subsiding through morning.

* WHERE...5NM East of Mackinac Bridge to Presque Isle Light MI
including Bois Blanc Island, Presque Isle Light to Sturgeon Pt
MI Including Thunder Bay National Marine Sanctuary and
Sturgeon Pt to Alabaster MI.

* WHEN...Until 11 AM EST this morning.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM EST THIS MORNING... ...GALE WARNING IS CANCELLED
